::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}
I'm a M.Sc student at [IRLab](https://ir.sdu.edu.cn/index_en.htm) of [Shandong University](https://www.en.sdu.edu.cn/), supervised by Prof. [Pengjie Ren](https://pengjieren.github.io/) and Prof. [Zhaochun Ren](https://renzhaochun.github.io/).
I received my B.E. from [Taishan College](https://www.tsxt.sdu.edu.), [Shandong University](https://www.en.sdu.edu.cn/) in 2023.

I'm interested in (theoretical, analytical) information retrieval, especially in generative retrieval, embedding models, and recommender systems.

Please feel free to contact me at _furyton AT outlook DOT com_.

:::
